REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0466 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GET 04-09 0069

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GETS 103 MLN STG HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it operated in the money market this morning, buying 103 mln stg bank bills. The central bank bought in band one 60 mln stg at 9-7/8, in band two eight mln at 9-13/16, in band three 26 mln at 9-3/4 and in band four nine mln stg at 9-11/16 pct. This compares with the bank's forecast of a 400 mln stg shortfall today. REUTER
